articles.author: Akilah Johnson, Sabrina Malhi
articles.title: U.S. life expectancy down for second-straight year, fueled by covid-19 - The Washington Post
articles.description: Americans can now expect to live as long as they did in 1996, according to the provisional data released by the National Center for Health Statistics.
articles.content:
Comment on this story

articles.title: Energy plan: Osinbajo to meet US Vice President - Punch Newspapers
articles.description: Vice President Yemi Osinbajo will on Wednesday depart Abuja for the United States of America to seek global partnerships and support for Nigeria’s recently launched Energy Transition Plan.
articles.content:

articles.author: Alice Yan
articles.title: 'Fake Americano' to cope with heatwave: doctors in China warn against using traditional Chinese medicine to create 'risky' trendy drink - The Star Online
articles.description: Doctors in China have warned against a new trend of mixing a traditional Chinese medicine (TCM) liquid with iced water to what fans say looks and tastes like an iced Americano as a way to cool down during the country’s ongoing record heatwave.
